definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

pinyin: du2 sheng1 zi3 nu:3 zheng4 ce4

sentences.english: China is implementing a family planning policy. So I'm the only child in my family.
sentences.chinese: 中国正在实施计划生育政策，所以我是家中的独生子。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the psychological state of criminal adolescences from the single child families.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨独生子犯罪者心理状况。

sentences.english: If they firmly believe one-child policy, there will be more and more the dink.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们坚信独生子女政策，将会有越来越多的丁克。
中国实行独生子女政策。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate mental health status of only-child nurses.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解独生子女护士的心理健康状况。

sentences.english: "Only children often grow up to be self-centred, " she was quoted as saying.
sentences.chinese: 她认为独生子女容易以自我为中心。

sentences.english: The incidence of injury was closely related to parental culture background and being only-child or not.
sentences.chinese: 伤害发生率与父母文化程度及是否独生子女密切相关。

sentences.english: How to bring up the only child triggered many debates in China.
sentences.chinese: 怎样培养好独生子女在中国引发了许多辩论。

sentences.english: The first generation born under the one-child policy has reached the age of childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 中国的第一代独生子女已经到了婚育年龄。

sentences.english: The first generation under-child policy has reached the age of childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 中国的第一代独生子女已经到了婚育年龄。

sentences.english: The only child acceded to the family estate.
sentences.chinese: 这个独生子继承了家产。

sentences.english: But an only child isn’t necessarily a loner, misfit and brat.
sentences.chinese: 但独生子女并不必然就会孤独，不合群并且淘气。

sentences.english: Today, the majority of kindergarten children in China are only-children.
sentences.chinese: 今天中国幼儿园的大多数孩子都是独生子女。

sentences.english: Nobita is a fourth grader in Tokyo and an only child of the family.
sentences.chinese: 大雄是个东京的小学四年级生，以及家里的独生子。

sentences.english: Chinese Gen Ys are single children born under China's one-child policy.
sentences.chinese: 代是在中国计划生育国策下出生的独生子女。

sentences.english: Be you aware of your son's falling into evil way?
sentences.chinese: 您知道您的独生子正在走邪道吗？

definition: Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]
lit. a pearl in the palm (idiom)/fig. beloved person (esp. daughter)
